page.title: 11ROWSLEY WELL-DRESSINGS
page.content: ROWSLEY WELL-DRESSING In our block there is part of a village called Rowsley.Every year Rowsley has a festival about the same time as every other village in Derbyshire.That is because of the Derbyshire well dressing Festival.Every village in Derbyshire makes a well dressing made of clay and paper.The first thing that happens in the Festival is the procession for the fancy dress.This year there was a Festival Princess for the first time ever.After the procession came the fancy dress.On the field where the fancy dress took place there were some stalls with food and other objects on them.The next day started of with the well dressing.As soon as that had finished our school displayed some maypole and country dancing.Allso on the rec there were sports .
